##################
# Sample Slide Show (S9) template package manifest using Rslidy
# Place the main folder in ~/.slideshow/templates/
# Then convert slides with: slideshow build slides.md -t rslidy
# Change as desired/needed
#
# Configured to use the following headers in slides.html.erb:
#
# author: Your Name Here
# title: Your Slide Show Title Here
# copyright: footer: Your Footer Here
#

__file__.html slides.html

# includes (the lib folder is generated by gulp)

lib/rslidy.min.js
lib/rslidy.min.css
